author: furfari
msg: Updated Pom to build 4 UPnP bundle. The UPnP base driver module is commented because there is dependency with an external Library.
See the log message about UPnP Base Driver to install manually the library.

author: furfari
msg: Committed the initial version of the UPnP TV bundle (FELIX-52).
A first sample to test the BaseDriver on the OSGi side.
You can use the Intel UpnP Toolkit to listen real devices on the UPnP network.
